name: Loaded Pirates
description:
Ahoy!
This is my first published game ever, it was made during the Blackthornprod game jam game, 
In this game, you are a pirate who tries to defeat all enemies in order to get the treasure.

Controls:
Left mouse button - Aim & Move (Jump)
Right mouse button - Aim & Shoot bombs
Mouse wheel - Change held item
R - Restart
Esc - Open settings

Theme:
Less is More - The more items you carry the heavier you are.
